nodes.bodyText: Not sure why ProductDTO & Id are not included in properties.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2501,6 +2501,17 @@ components:
         enabled:
           type: boolean
 
+    ProductCertificateDTO:
+      description: DTO representing product certificates presented to the API
+      allOf:
+        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TimestampedEntity'
+        - type: object
+          properties:

nodes.bodyText:
Getter and Setter of Id have ignored with @JsonIgnore annotation. Hence removed as it is not exposed over API.
Similarly, the Product is also not exposed over API. Maybe I can keep writeOnly for Product in properties to set the Product.
